title: VolleySkip+
description: A Chrome extension to optimize volleyball video navigation on VBTV using custom video.js controls.

title: Apartment Scraper
description: A Python-based CLI and Chrome Extension that logs apartment listings to Notion, with deduplication and timestamping.

title: RWD Portfolio Map
description: An internal dashboard for Roche displaying global real-world data asset coverage by geography and metadata quality.
